text: Shubhdeep Singh Sidhu(11 June 1993 - 29 May 2022), better known by his stage name Sidhu Moose Wala, was an Indian Rapper, Singer, and Politician.He primarily worked in Punjabi-language music and cinema. Moose Wala is widely considered one of the most influential and successful Indian rappers of all time. == God of music industry == He started his career as a songwriter for the song "License" by Ninja. He was known for his track "So High". In 2018, he released his first album PBX 1. His 2019 single "47" was ranked on the UK Singles Chart. In 2020, Moose Wala was named by The Guardian among 50 upcoming artists. == Politics == Moose Wala was a member of the Indian National Congress. He unsuccessfully ran the 2022 Punjab Legislative Assembly election. == Death == Sidhu Moose Wala was assassinated by drive-by shooting on 29 May 2022 in Jawaharke, Mansa district. He was 28 years old. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Murders by firearm Category:Indian singer-songwriters Category:Politicians from Punjab, India Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian rappers Category:Hip hop singers
title: Sidhu Moose Wala
